messages.title: Strong and Stable Leadership
messages.content: We need strong and stable leadership with Theresa May, not a coalition of chaos led by Jeremy Corbyn

keyPolicies.policyTitle: WHIPPS CROSS HOSPITAL AND THE NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigning for more money for Whipps Cross Hospital from the Government. Fought for improvements and redevelopment of services in our local NHS.
Supportive of Black Cab drivers ensuring they are not treated unfairly.
Opposition to road closures on the A406 that cause congestion in Chingford and damage local businesses.
Helped residents rebuild Chingford War Memorial after vandalism.
Helped Hale End Library stay open and supported local libraries.
Helped join forces with the local Labour Mayor for an investigation to save the Crown Post Office.
Supported local Labour in asking the Council to introduce 15 minutes of free parking in key parts of Woodford and Chingford to help local businesses.
Campaigns for air quality improving plans and opposed concrete factory move to Galleria Court.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: THIS ELECTION IS ALL ABOUT LEADERSHIP
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support for Theresa May for strong and stable leadership.
Belief in establishing Britain as the strongest country in Europe by leaving the EU and not being run by Brussels bureaucrats.

issues.brexitEurope: Ensure Britain is no longer run by Brussels bureaucrats. Establish Britain as the strongest country in Europe.
issues.environment: Campaign for air quality improvements. Oppose concrete factory move to Galleria Court.
issues.health: Campaign for more money for Whipps Cross Hospital from the Government.
issues.transport: Opposition to the A406 road closures that cause congestion and damage local businesses.

community.content: Helped residents rebuild Chingford War Memorial after vandalism. Supported local libraries and helped Hale End Library stay open. Campaign for Whipps Cross Hospital improvements and redevelopment.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud to have always put the people of Chingford and Woodford Green first during 25 years as your MP.

politicalExperience.role: MP for Chingford and Woodford Green
politicalExperience.achievements: Led numerous campaigns, helped local communities, supported national initiatives and governance.

endorsements.endorsement: "Most people know someone who has been helped by Iain"

quotes.text: Most people know someone who has been helped by Iain.

examples: Theresa May or a weak, chaotic coalition with Jeremy Corbyn
